data.title: William H. McGuffey
data.meta_description: William H. McGuffey - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses William McGuffey and his contributions to education through his famous McGuffey's Eclectic Readers. It describes McGuffey's background growing up on the American frontier and his career as an educator. It summarizes McGuffey's innovative teaching methods used in his Readers that integrated new vocabulary words into stories to aid memorization. The document also examines McGuffey's views on public education and the role of parents in a child's education.
